hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT CDPR.CDPR_DESC,CDPR.CDPR_UNIT FROM CD_WH_PACKAGE_RELATION CDPR LEFT JOIN CD_WH_PACKAGE CDPA ON CDPR.CDPR_CDPA_PM_CODE = CDPA.PM_CODE AND CDPR.ORG_ID=CDPA.ORG_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND CDPR.REC_STATUS = '0' AND CDPR.CDPR_UNIT = 'EA' <<AND CDPA.CDPA_CODE LIKE :cdpaCode>> <<AND CDPR.ORG_ID = :orgId>>
